CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Status,"Approved"),"Approved",IF(ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Open"),"Open",IF(ISPICKVAL( Status,"In Progress"),"In Progress",IF(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed - Converted (Qualified)"),"Closed - Converted (Qualified)",IF(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Rejected"),"Rejected"," ")))))
CustomField.label: Lead Status Mapping
